Reviews.Content: okay ive stayed budget hotels budget hotels middle positives free breakfast yes cereal toast fruit yogurt coffee juice hey thats bit didnt mind location 5 min walk earls court tube station minutes direction restaurants marks spencer quiet street concierge nice housekeeper little odd white people tiny own shower tv bed okay day odd housekeeper free wifi negatives noise guests slamming doors late night noise walls etc guess thats expected bbs london ear plugs blocked refurbishment wasnt bad london

Reviews.Content: location west brompton tube station nice fast free wifi decent sized wtih refurbishment staff polite housekeeper forgot change towels beds soon rectified overall experience adequate price paid london lowest price hesitate
